title: Understanding Phobias
text: Phobias are more than just being scared of something. They involve intense fear that can affect daily life.

title: Characteristics of Phobias
text: Phobias often lead to avoidance behavior. This means people might go out of their way to avoid the object or situation they fear.

hintAnswer: excessive and irrational fear of a specific object, situation, or activity that is typically harmless; intense anxiety that can lead to avoidance behavior, severely impacting a person’s daily life and functioning
title: Defining Phobias
choices: excessive and irrational fear of a specific object, situation, or activity that is typically harmless; intense anxiety that can lead to avoidance behavior, severely impacting a person’s daily life and functioning

a sudden episode of intense fear or discomfort lasting several minutes or longer. During a panic attack, an individual may experience physical symptoms, such as sweating, trembling, heart palpitations, shortness of breath, and chest pain
